document.full_text: energy department and national nuclear security administration official detailed radiation measured from a recent aerial survey of parts of japan close to a crippled nuclear plant, finding a plume of high exposure headed northwest of the accident.
document.title: federal officials release japanese radiation measures
lines_and_colors: energy department and national nuclear security administration official detailed radiation measured from a recent aerial survey of parts of japan close to a crippled nuclear plant, finding a plume of high exposure headed northwest of the accident.
